descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center][size=3][img]http://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/71558-0-1448429904.jpg[/img]

This mod adds a female follower.
This is standalone. So you can use this with no problem whatever body types you're using.


[b][Follower detail][/b]

Name: Katlin
Voice: Even toned (Vanilla)
Body: CBBE or UNPB
Location: Moorside Inn, Morthal
Combat Style: Archery
Perks: Overdraw, Critical Shot, Stealth, Light Foot, Agile Defender
ETC: Essential and marriable


[b][Recommended Mods]
[/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457]Face Light by tktk1[/url] (I recommend the 'FacelightDark Target' spell)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35303]Female Facial Animation by nao4288[/url] (I recommend an optional file too)


[b][Credit]
[/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951]Enhance Character Edit by tktk[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666]Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition by Caliente[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55761]Real Girls Realistic Body Texture for CBBE by drunkenmojo[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267]SG Female Textures Renewal by Hello Santa[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40038]The female textures tweaked by rxkx22[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311]KS Hairdos - Renewal by Kalilies[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722]The Eyes Of Beauty by LogRaam[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54416]Eye Normal Map Fix by Mr. Dave[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53442]zzjay's wardrobe by zzjay[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37900]UNP BLESSED BODY- UNPB REDUX PROJECT by Blessed Redux Project team[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36425]Real Girls Realistic Body Texture for UNP by Zonzai and Seren4XX[/url]
[/size] [/center][center][size=3]Thank you for the mods.
 
 
[b][Change Log][/b]

v1.1 Adds the UNPB version. And fixs bugs.
[/size]
